          <title>
            <string language="it">Rifrazione della luce nelle lenti</string>
            <string language="en">Light refraction in lenses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Brechung in den Objektiven</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction légère dans des objectifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction claro nas lentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά διάθλαση στους φακούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción ligera en lentes</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Impara circa le differenze tra le lenti convesse e concave.</string>
            <string language="en">Learn the difference between convex and concave lenses.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">convesso</string>
            <string language="en">convex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">concavo</string>

          </structure>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie den Unterschied zwischen den konvexen
und konkaven Objektiven.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apprenez la différence entre les objectifs 
convexes et concaves.</string>
          </description>

          </description>

φακών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda la diferencia entre las lentes convexas y
cóncavas.</string>
